ingredients.content: 600 g pointed cabbage, cut in strips
150 g carrots, cut in pieces (2 cm)
100 g pork belly, boneless, skinless, sliced
1000 g tinned butter beans, rinsed, drained

preparations.content: Place 1500 g water in mixing bowl and bring to the boil <b>15 min/100°C/speed 1<b>. Place a large bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in cabbage. Pour hot water over cabbage and set aside for approx. 10 minutes. Meanwhile, continue with recipe.
Place garlic, onions, carrots, tomatoes and oil in mixing bowl, chop <b>20 sec/speed 7<b> then heat <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add bacon and wine then reduce <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.

Add bay leaf, vegetable stock, chilli, pork belly, spare ribs and 150 g water. Drain cabbage in Varoma dish. Place Varoma with cabbage into position and add farinheira, chorizo and black pudding. Cover Varoma and cook <b>25 min/Varoma//speed <b>. Remove Varoma and set aside.
Add steamed chorizo, beans and remaining 100 g water then cook <b>8 min/100°C//speed <b>. Transfer to a serving bowl.
Slice farinheira and black pudding. Add sliced farinheira, sliced black pudding and cabbage to serving bowl then serve hot.
